original_title: Derniers jours d'un médecin de campagne
overview: Patrick Laine, 68 years old, has been practicing medicine for 35 years in Saulnot, a small town in Haute-Saône. Passionate about his work but worn out, he knows he will have to stop. But no successor has come forward to take over. His last months of practice are becoming increasingly difficult as he approaches what he has always wanted to avoid: leaving his patients without a doctor and without support.
title: Derniers jours d'un médecin de campagne
